name: Notion Invoice Creator
description: Create & share invoices in minutesSave time with the Notion Invoice Creator, an easy-to-use template that gives you editable invoices you can edit and share with your clients. Additionally the template automatically stores all of your invoices so you can easily track what is paid or unpaid. Welcome to a new hassle-free invoicing process.
